<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1905) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 160 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50), [Undead Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=176) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1903)

</column>

---

Your mature animal companions continue to grow and develop. They each become [nimble](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=2&Advanced=true) or [savage](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=1&Advanced=true) animal companions (your choice, choose for each companion, including those that become mature after you take this feat), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

<title level="2">Incredible Beastmaster Companion leads to...</title>
[Specialized Beastmaster Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1908)
name: Incredible Beastmaster Companion
